page.title: 06Playground games in Elton
page.content: These are some of the games we have in the playground.The game "Tig on Lines" is played on the netball lines. One person is "On" and he tries to chase and touch everyone else on the net ball lines.When he touches somebody that person becomes "On".Another game is Hopscotch.This is played on a grid of squares from one to ten.A stone is thrown onto square 1 and the person jumps over number 1 on to number 2.If the stone misses the square you miss a turn.Next time she throws on to number 2 and jumps to 3, and so on up to ten. "British Bulldog" is a game where one person tries to run to the other side of the playground without being caught by the bogeyman in the middle.If he makes it everyone can run across.
